Update your Jenius app to the latest version for an even better Jenius experience.

With the new update, you can easily view the flow of your savings balance and interest of your Flexi Saver and Dream Saver.

In this version, we’ve fixed some bugs on the m-Card activation process.

You can connect one of the foreign currency balances (USD, SGD, or JPY) to your m-Card for easier transactions in the United States, Singapore, Japan, and online.

From activating to buying and selling foreign currencies, everything can be done easily from your smartphone.

Update your Jenius app for a better transaction experience.

We want to help you have a better Life Finance.
That’s why we keep making improvements and enhancing our app’s performance. We want to provide a better Jenius experience not only so you can make transactions more easily later, but also have a smooth registration process.

To use and make the most of all Jenius features, activate your account after you register. It’s easy and free. You can do it without a hassle using Video Call.

Now the list of banks and payments in Jenius Send It are expanding.

We added ATMB Plus on the bank list, so you can top up your commuter line Multi Trip Card more easily.

And now we have PLN on our biller list! Pay your electricity bill and purchase PLN prepaid token in quick and easy steps with Jenius Send It menu.

Update your Jenius app to the latest version for a better Life Finance experience.

We've redesigned the way you do financial activities for a smoother experience.
This version comes with a better app performance.
Are you ready to have a better Life Finance with the latest version of Jenius?
Optimization

Update your Jenius app to see how we reinvent the way people send money with Moneymoji. You can now add animation and personalized your message.

You can also get your own NPG x-Card (National Payment Gateway) for a more convenient transaction all over Indonesia.

To use and make the most of all Jenius features, call a Jenius Crew to your place to activate your account. It’s easy, simple, and free!

Two is better than one.
 
Introducing our two latest features: Jenius QR and Sinaya Prioritas.
 
Jenius QR allows you to pay using the QR code at all merchants with QRIS. For selected customers, enjoy free domestic & overseas ATM withdrawal, and a dedicated Relationship Manager brought to you by Sinaya Prioritas.
 
On top of that, we've fixed some bugs related to the registration process.

Go update your Jenius app!

Hi teman Jenius, there’s important news for you.

In Jenius, the safety and convenience of your transactions are our top priority. Starting this version, Jenius can detect the usage of jailbroken devices.

Furthermore, jailbroken devices won’t be allowed to access Jenius.

Please note that jailbroken devices are more vulnerable to virus and malware attacks.

Update your app, okay?

Much love,
Jenius.

- Permanent block can be done 2 times/month for each Jenius debit card you have
- You can see card processing status on Card Center

Also some enhancements here and there for a better Jenius experience. Don’t forget to update, ok!

Also, you can check all upcoming subscription payments via In & Out - Upcoming.

Jenius would like to share the spirit of Ramadan with you.

Now, you can pay Zakat Al-Fitr via Jenius. Go to Send It, choose Bills, and click Zakat & Others. Choose Baznas then pick Zakat Al-Fitr.

There are other institutions as well, Rumah Zakat and Dompet Dhuafa. You can pay Zakat on Income, Zakat Mal, or help others through sadaqah and infaq.

Your Jenius Debit Card is about to expire? Replace your card ONLY via Jenius app!

Please note, we don’t offer card replacement via other media.

Just go to Card Center, choose the debit card you want to replace, and confirm your address. A new card will be sent to your address straightaway!

Once the new card arrives, don’t forget to activate it. You can still use your old card until the validity date.

Card replacement is free of charge, so what are you waiting for? Update now!
